title: Project, "Gold crosses", ca. 1910
medium: Pencil, yellowish watercolor, white heightening, gray paper
inscribed: The first one was marked and signed by the customer: AEM
description: Three small gold crosses with diamonds. A big diamond is in the center in each case. Four small ones are at the ends of the arms (A) surroung the big diamond (B) are in the corners (C).

tombstone.epitaph: Project, "Gold crosses", ca. 1910.Pencil, yellowish watercolor, white heightening, gray paper. 1939-84-41.
